name: CFDateFormatterStyle
desc: Data type for predefined date and time format styles.

items.name: case fullStyle
items.desc: Specifies a full style with complete details, such as “Tuesday, April 12, 1952 AD” or “3:30:42pm PST”.

items.name: case longStyle
items.desc: Specifies a long style, typically with full text, such as “November 23, 1937” or “3:30:32pm”.

items.name: case mediumStyle
items.desc: Specifies a medium style, typically with abbreviated text, such as “Nov 23, 1937”.

items.name: case shortStyle
items.desc: Specifies a short style, typically numeric only, such as “11/23/37” or “3:30pm”.
